local_intent: Execute a side grasp on the glass_bottle by detecting, aligning, grasping, and verifying stability.
assumptions: goal_pose is used as the grasp pose key
coherence_with_global: Realizes the grasp phase consistent with the global tree: open -> compute side grasp -> approach/align -> grasp -> verify. Uses 'goal_pose' as the blackboard pose key to fit allowed value bins while preserving side-grasp semantics.
